interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Big Bang Theory: The Complete Tenth Season [DVD]
Review Date: 2019/12/18
Store: Johnny Galecki  (Actor),     Jim Parsons  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
Product Description: ['The Big Bang Theory: The Complete Tenth Season (DVD)', 'The universe of Drs. Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper is endlessly complicated and hilarious as THE BIG BANG THEORY enters the tenth dimension! Last season, Leonard and Penny went from next-door neighbors to next-door newlyweds with a nuptial excursion to Vegas. This season, they find themselves in a repeating paradigm as they re-create their wedding – this time with family including Penny’s mother (Katey Sagal) and brother (Jack McBrayer) and Leonard’s parents (Christine Baranski & Judd Hirsch). Meanwhile, the Relationship Agreement between Sheldon and Amy added an entirely new subsection with their annual coitus clause. Also, gravitating in their universe, Howard and Bernadette prepare for the arrival of a little Wolowitz, while Raj finds himself juggling not one, but two girlfriends. Prepare to test a new hypothesis of inspired comedy that’s nothing short of genius in Season Ten!', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'DVD, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Steve Holland, Maria Ferrari, Bill Prady, Jim Parsons, Kunal Nayyar, Simon Helberg, Jim Reynolds, Dave Goetsch, Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco, Mayim Bialik, Melissa Rauch, Steven Molaro, Eric Kaplan, Chuck LorreSteve Holland, Maria Ferrari, Bill Prady, Jim Parsons, Kunal Nayyar, Simon Helberg, Jim Reynolds, Dave Goetsch, Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco, Mayim Bialik, Melissa Rauch, Steven Molaro, Eric Kaplan, Chuck Lorre  See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '3', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'DVD, NTSC', 'Release date': 'September 12, 2017', 'Actors': 'Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco, Simon Helberg, Kunal Nayyar', 'Dubbed': 'English', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Chuck Lorre, Steven Molaro, Bill Prady, Dave Goetsch, Eric Kaplan', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '3'}
Review Text: What a bunch of both fun and interesting characters in this show about four nerds and the cute lively blonde gal who moves in next door.
Review Title: Great off beat comedy.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Sing
Matthew McConaughey  (Actor),     Reese Witherspoon  (Actor),     Garth Jennings  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy
["From Illumination Entertainment, the studio that brought you The Secret Life of Pets comes an animated comedy about finding the music that lives inside all of us. Sing stars Academy Award winner Matthew McConaughey as Buster Moon, an eternally optimistic koala who puts on the world's greatest singing competition to save his crumbling theater; Academy Award winner Reese Witherspoon as Rosita, an overworked and underappreciated mother of 25 piglets desperate to unleash her inner diva; Scarlett Johansson as Ash, a punk rock porcupine with a beautiful voice behind her prickly exterior; and Taron Egerton as Johnny, a young gangster gorilla looking to break free of his family's felonies. Sing is the musical comedy event of the year!Bonus Content:", 'The Making of Sing', 'The Making of Sing', 'Finding the Rhythm: Editing Sing', 'Finding the Rhythm: Editing Sing', 'Character Profiles', 'Character Profiles', '"Don\'t You Worry \'Bout a Thing" Music Video', '"Don\'t You Worry \'Bout a Thing" Music Video', 'Making a Music Video with Tori Kelly', 'Making a Music Video with Tori Kelly', '"Faith" Music Video', '"Faith" Music Video', '"Faith" Lyric Video', '"Faith" Lyric Video', '"Set\xa0It All Free" Lyric Video', '"Set\xa0It All Free" Lyric Video', 'Sing & Dance! - "Faith"', 'Sing & Dance! - "Faith"', 'The Sing Network', 'The Sing Network', 'The Best of Gunter', 'The Best of Gunter', '"Gunter Babysits" Mini-Movie', '"Gunter Babysits" Mini-Movie', '"Love At First Sight" Mini-Movie', '"Love At First Sight" Mini-Movie', '"Eddie\'s Life Coach" Mini Movie', '"Eddie\'s Life Coach" Mini Movie', 'The Making of the Mini-Movies', 'The Making of the Mini-Movies']

Watched it and had to get it. so much fun.
So much fun!
The Big Bang Theory: The Twelfth and Final Season [DVD]
Johnny Galecki  (Actor),     Jim Parsons  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
['The Big Bang Theory: The Twelfth and Final Season: Leonard and Sheldon are brilliant physicists – geniuses in the laboratory but socially challenged everywhere else. Enter beautiful, street-smart neighbor Penny, who aims to teach them a thing or two about life. Despite their on-again, off-again relationship in the past, Leonard and Penny have finally gotten married. Even Sheldon has found a female companion, entering into a “relationship agreement” with neurobiologist Amy Farrah Fowler, and he recently took their relationship to the next level by marrying her after a long courtship. In their free time, Leonard and Sheldon enjoy fantasy role-playing games with their ever-expanding universe of friends, including fellow scientists Raj, Howard and Howard’s adorable microbiologist wife, Bernadette, who is adjusting to life with their two children.']

This show is a riot of fun and yet quite insightful often times. Love the characters!
Witty and somewhat wacky comedy.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Main Interests:** Animated family movies, comedies, television shows, musicals, and performing arts, with a specific fondness for ensemble sitcoms.
- **Preferred Content:** Enjoys engaging, light-hearted narratives enhanced by musical elements, wit, and relatable characters. Shows an appreciation for comedy that balances humor with heartfelt moments.
- **Audience Engagement:** Actively seeks out family-friendly entertainment, showing a particular inclination towards shows that resonate with multi-generational audiences, ensuring shared viewing experiences.
- **Rating Behavior:** Consistently maintains a high ratings average (4.8 overall), recently awarding top marks to both a comedy series and other beloved shows, reflecting a strong appreciation for quality storytelling and character dynamics.
- **Purchase Patterns:** Exhibits a preference for acquiring products that promise enjoyment and can be enjoyed socially, particularly within the comedy genre, which now prominently features ensemble casts.
- **Community Engagement:** Engages with and comments on content featuring well-known actors and production teams, reinforcing a desire for recognized talent and productions with a strong reputation.

Overall, this user favors uplifting and entertaining stories that can be enjoyed alone or shared with family and friends, particularly those that highlight humorous narratives and dynamic character interactions within a comedic context.
